company.name: iMovo
company.description:
iMovo is a professional services & solutions organization specialising in Customer Experience Management, Business Intelligence & Data Analytics, Marketing Automation, Workforce Management and Artificial Intelligence. 

We are  committed to assist companies maximise their information assets about customers and improve their workforce productivity especially in the areas of sales, marketing and customer service.  We also specialise in developing management dashboards and corporate scorecard applications using leading edge technologies such as Qlik, the industry leading business intelligence platform. 

By combining CRM and BI approaches , we help our customers achieve a true 360 degree view of their business and their customers and provide a factual data based basis for key strategic decisions. Our specialized services offer solutions that may be applied within various industry sectors such as financial services , retail, the professional services industry and the public sector.

We are driven by one aspiration - to become a market thought leader  as well as a relevant player within our areas of specialisation, internationally.
